price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߰ ߒ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߌ ߦߴߌ ߟߊ߫ ߝߟߌ߬ ߞߘߐ ߘߐ߫ ߡߎߣߎ߲߬
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
